20110106023209.000|20110106023212.000|CC1|OIL SPILL IN THE GULF OF MEXICO 
20110106023212.000|20110106023213.000|CC1|LAST YEAR HAS BLAMED THE        
20110106023213.000|20110106023215.000|CC1|DISASTER ON SYSTEMIC FAILURES OF
20110106023215.000|20110106023217.000|CC1|MANAGEMENT AND WARNED A SIMILAR 
20110106023217.000|20110106023219.000|CC1|ACCIDENT COULD HAPPEN IN THE    
20110106023219.000|20110106023221.000|CC1|FUTURE.                         
20110106023221.000|20110106023222.000|CC1|BP AND ITS BUSINESS PARTNERS    
20110106023222.000|20110106023225.000|CC1|MADE A SERIES OF DECISIONS THAT 
20110106023225.000|20110106023227.000|CC1|REDUCED COSTS AND INCREASED THE 
20110106023227.000|20110106023228.000|CC1|RISK OF AN EXPLOSION.           
20110106023228.000|20110106023229.000|CC1|OUR WASHINGTON CORRESPONDENT    
20110106023229.000|20110106023232.000|CC1|TOLD ME HOW BP HAS REACTED TO   
20110106023232.000|20110106023232.000|CC1|THE REPORT.

20110106023236.000|20110106023239.000|CC1|WITH THE COMMISSION AND         
20110106023239.000|20110106023241.000|CC1|COOPERATED WITH THE INQUIRY     
20110106023241.000|20110106023242.000|CC1|THROUGHOUT.                     
20110106023242.000|20110106023245.000|CC1|IT SAID THE FINDINGS OF THE     
20110106023245.000|20110106023249.000|CC1|INQUIRY SUPPORTS BP'S INTERNAL

20110106023250.000|20110106023251.000|CC1|THEY WERE NOT THE ONLY ONES TO

20110106024053.000|20110106024054.000|CC1|GREETED WITH CHEERS OUTSIDE     
20110106024054.000|20110106024054.000|CC1|COURT TODAY.                    
20110106024054.000|20110106024059.000|CC1|MALIK MUMTAZ HUSSEIN QADRI, AN  
20110106024059.000|20110106024100.000|CC1|ELITE BODYGUARD SUPPOSED TO
